attributes.action: PM to condemn Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Turkey for supporting ISIL terrorists
attributes.additional_details: The governments of Turkey and Jordan are buying the ISIL smuggled oil. Equally, Saudi Arabia and Qatar support terrorism and harbour Salafi-Wahabi cult which is the think tank for Al-Qaeda, ISIL, Talaban, 9-11 terrorist attackers and the financiers of Wahabi school in the UK that advocate the use of Sharia Laws in the UK. 15 out of the 19 9-11 attackers were Saudis, all of whom were followers of the Salafi-Wahabi think tank.
attributes.background: ISIL remain openly supported by the Saudi regime to the extent that during the holy month of Ramadan and against the will of mass majority of Muslims, special prayers were held in the holy Mecca to support ISIL and publicly aired on Al Arabia TV, yet the British government has kept quiet about it
